summary: FI Dashboard Enhanced Features testing complete. Backend API returns all new fields (duration_distribution, sector_breakdown, cash_flow_calendar) correctly. Frontend displays 4 tabs (Overview, Analytics, Cash Flow, Activity) with Recharts charts. All tabs navigation works. Mobile responsive design verified at 390x844 viewport.

issues: Recharts console warning about width/height -1 during initial render. This is a known Recharts issue with ResponsiveContainer when parent dimensions aren't available immediately. Does not affect functionality.

success_rate.backend: 100% (10/10 tests passed - 1 rate limit error not a code issue)
success_rate.frontend: 100% - All 4 tabs working, all charts visible, mobile responsive

pe_desk.notes: SMIFS employee - exempt from license checks. Has full access to FI Dashboard.

context_for_next_testing_agent: FI Dashboard has 4 tabs: Overview, Analytics, Cash Flow, Activity. Uses Recharts library (v3.7.0) for charts. Frontend uses getMockData() to display sample data when API returns empty arrays. API endpoint /api/fixed-income/dashboard returns duration_distribution, sector_breakdown, cash_flow_calendar along with existing fields.

backend_api.duration_distribution field present with: PASS - < 1 year, 1-3 years, 3-5 years, 5-7 years, 7+ years
backend_api.sector_breakdown field present: PASS - Returns array of sectors with count and value
backend_api.summary has all required fields: PASS - total_aum, total_holdings, total_clients, avg_ytm, avg_duration, total_accrued_interest, pending_orders

frontend_ui_desktop.Summary cards visible: PASS - Total AUM, Holdings, Avg YTM, Avg Duration
frontend_ui_desktop.Analytics tab - Duration Distribution: PASS - Bar chart with X-axis labels
frontend_ui_desktop.Analytics tab - YTM Distribution: PASS - Area chart with X-axis labels
frontend_ui_desktop.Cash Flow tab - 12-Month Cash Flow Calen: PASS - Composed chart with Coupons, Maturities, Total
frontend_ui_desktop.Cash Flow tab - Summary cards: PASS - Total Coupons (12M), Total Maturities (12M), Total Cash Flow, Accrued Interest
frontend_ui_desktop.Activity tab - Recent Orders: PASS - Table with View All button
frontend_ui_desktop.Activity tab - Quick Actions: PASS - Security Master, New Order, IPO/NFO, Reports buttons
frontend_ui_desktop.Tab navigation works: PASS - Can switch between all 4 tabs

mocked_data_note: MOCKED: Frontend uses getMockData() function to display sample portfolio data (45 holdings, â‚¹12.5 Cr AUM, 9.25% avg YTM) when API returns empty data. Charts show placeholders/empty states when no real holdings exist in database.
